New Records: Devon Conway scored 92 runs, the highest by a New Zealand player against Australia in Australia since 2011
New Zealand scored 200 runs in 16.3 overs, their highest total in a T20 match
Key Match Events: Aaron Finch was bowled out early
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Finch won the toss and chose to bowl
New Zealand's strategy focused on aggressive batting
Post-Match Reflections: Devon Conway was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand's victory was their biggest ever over Australia in T20
Australia's batting struggled to form partnerships
